6.name: Glyph of Bloodthirst
6.description: Increases the healing you receive from your Bloodthirst ability by 100%.

7.name: Glyph of Rapid Charge
7.description: Reduces the cooldown of your Charge ability by 7%.

8.name: Glyph of Cleaving
8.description: Increases the number of targets your Cleave hits by 1.

9.name: Glyph of Devastate
9.description: Your Devastate ability now applies two stacks of Sunder Armor.

10.name: Glyph of Execution
10.description: Your Execute ability deals damage as if you had 10 additional rage.

11.name: Glyph of Hamstring
11.description: Gives your Hamstring ability a 10% chance to immobilize the target for 5 sec.

12.name: Glyph of Heroic Strike
12.description: You gain 10 rage when you critically strike with your Heroic Strike ability.

13.name: Glyph of Intervene
13.description: Increases the number attacks you intercept for your Intervene target by 1.

14.name: Glyph of Barbaric Insults
14.description: Your Mocking Blow ability generates 100% additional threat.

15.name: Glyph of Mortal Strike
15.description: Increases the damage of your Mortal Strike ability by 10%.

16.name: Glyph of Overpower
16.description: Adds a 100% chance to enable your Overpower when your attacks are parried.

17.name: Glyph of Rending
17.description: Increases the duration of your Rend ability by 6 sec.

18.name: Glyph of Revenge
18.description: After using Revenge, your next Heroic Strike costs no rage.

19.name: Glyph of Blocking
19.description: Increases your block value by 10% for 10 sec after using your Shield Slam ability.

20.name: Glyph of Last Stand
20.description: Reduces the cooldown of your Last Stand ability by 1 min.

21.name: Glyph of Sunder Armor
21.description: Your Sunder Armor ability affects a second nearby target.

22.name: Glyph of Sweeping Strikes
22.description: Reduces the rage cost of your Sweeping Strikes ability by 100%.

23.name: Glyph of Taunt
23.description: Increases the chance for your Taunt ability to succeed by 8%.

24.name: Glyph of Resonating Power
24.description: Reduces the rage cost of your Thunder Clap ability by 5.

25.name: Glyph of Victory Rush

26.name: Glyph of Whirlwind
26.description: Reduces the cooldown of your Whirlwind by 2 sec.

27.name: Glyph of Bladestorm
27.description: Reduces the cooldown on Bladestorm by 15 sec.

28.name: Glyph of Shockwave
28.description: Reduces the cooldown on Shockwave by 3 sec.

29.name: Glyph of Vigilance
29.description: Your Vigilance ability transfers an additional 5% of your target's threat to you.

30.name: Glyph of Enraged Regeneration
30.description: Your Enraged Regeneration ability heals for an additional 10% of your health over its duration.

31.name: Glyph of Spell Reflection
31.description: Reduces the cooldown on Spell Reflection by 1 sec.

32.name: Glyph of Shield Wall
32.description: Reduces the cooldown on Shield Wall by 2 min, but Shield Wall now only reduces damage taken by 40%.

0.name: Glyph of Battle

1.description: Reduces the health cost of your Bloodrage ability by 100%.

3.description: Increases the damage of your Mocking Blow ability by 25%.

4.name: Glyph of Thunder Clap
4.description: Increases the radius of your Thunder Clap ability by 2 yards.

5.name: Glyph of Enduring Victory
5.description: Increases the window of opportunity in which you can use Victory Rush by 5 sec.

33.name: Glyph of Command
33.description: Increases the duration of your Commanding Shout ability by 2 min.

1.name: Glyph of Seal of Command
1.description: You gain 8% of your base mana each time you use a Judgement with Seal of Command active.

2.description: Increases your Hammer of Justice range by 5 yards.

3.description: Increases the amount of mana gained from your Spiritual Attunement spell by an additional 2%.

4.description: Reduces the mana cost of Hammer of Wrath by 100%.

5.description: Reduces the mana cost of your Crusader Strike ability by 20%.

6.description: Increases the duration and cooldown of Consecration by 2 sec.

7.description: Increases the chance for your Righteous Defense and Hand of Reckoning abilities to work successfully by 8% on each target.

8.description: Your Avenger's Shield hits 2 fewer targets, but for 100% more damage.

9.description: Reduces the casting time of your Turn Evil spell by 100%, but increases the cooldown by 8 sec.

10.description: Increases damage done by Exorcism by 20%.

11.description: Reduces the mana cost of your Cleanse and Purify spells by 20%.

14.description: Reduces the cooldown of your Hammer of Wrath spell by 50% while Avenging Wrath is active.

30.description: Reduces the mana cost of Shield of Righteousness by 80%.

32.description: Reduces the cooldown of Holy Shock by 1 sec.

21.description: Reduces the cooldown of your Lay on Hands spell by 5 min.

0.description: Reduces the cooldown of your Aimed Shot ability by 2 sec.

3.description: Increases the healing done by your Mend Pet ability by 40%.

7.description: Decreases the cooldown of Disengage by 5 sec.

18.description: While your Trueshot Aura is active, you have 10% increased critical strike chance on your Aimed Shot.

19.description: Decreases the mana cost of Volley by 20%.

20.description: Decreases the cooldown of your Wyvern Sting by 6 sec.

32.description: Reduces the cost of Mutilate by 5 energy.

23.description: Reduces the cast time of your Pick Lock ability by 100%.

27.description: Increases the mana you receive from your Thunderstorm spell by 2%, but it no longer knocks enemies back.

0.name: Glyph of Arcane Explosion
0.description: Reduces mana cost of Arcane Explosion by 10%.

1.name: Glyph of Arcane Missiles
1.description: Increases the critical strike damage bonus of Arcane Missiles by 25%.

2.name: Glyph of Arcane Power
2.description: Increases the duration of Arcane Power by 3 sec.

3.name: Glyph of Blink
3.description: Increases the distance you travel with the Blink spell by 5 yards.

4.name: Glyph of Evocation
4.description: Your Evocation ability also causes you to regain 60% of your health over its duration.

5.name: Glyph of Fireball
5.description: Increases the critical strike chance of Fireball by 5%, but removes the damage over time effect.

6.name: Glyph of Fire Blast
6.description: Increases the critical strike chance of Fire Blast by 50% when the target is stunned or incapacitated.

7.name: Glyph of Frost Nova
7.description: Your Frost Nova targets can take an additional 20% damage before the Frost Nova effect automatically breaks.

8.name: Glyph of Frostbolt
8.description: Increases the damage dealt by Frostbolt by 5%, but removes the slowing effect.

9.name: Glyph of Ice Armor
9.description: Your Ice Armor and Frost Armor spells grant an additional 50% armor and resistance.

10.name: Glyph of Ice Block
10.description: Your Frost Nova cooldown is now reset every time you use Ice Block.

11.name: Glyph of Ice Lance
11.description: Your Ice Lance now causes 4 times damage against frozen targets higher level than you instead of triple damage.

12.name: Glyph of Icy Veins
12.description: Your Icy Veins ability also removes all movement slowing and cast time slowing effects.

13.name: Glyph of Scorch
13.description: Increases the damage of your Scorch spell by 20%.

14.name: Glyph of Invisibility
14.description: Increases the duration of the Invisibility effect by 10 sec.

15.name: Glyph of Mage Armor
15.description: Your Mage Armor spell grants an additional 20% mana regeneration while casting.

16.name: Glyph of Mana Gem
16.description: Increases the mana received from using a mana gem by 40%.

17.name: Glyph of Molten Armor
17.description: Your Molten Armor grants an additional 20% of your spirit as critical strike rating.

18.name: Glyph of Polymorph
18.description: Your Polymorph spell also removes all damage over time effects from the target.

19.name: Glyph of Remove Curse
19.description: Your Remove Curse spell also makes the target immune to all curses for 4 sec.

20.name: Glyph of Water Elemental
20.description: Reduces the cooldown of your Summon Water Elemental spell by 30 sec.

27.name: Glyph of Frostfire
27.description: Increases the initial damage dealt by Frostfire Bolt by 2% and its critical strike chance by 2%.

29.name: Glyph of Arcane Blast
29.description: Increases the damage from your Arcane Blast buff by 3%.

30.name: Glyph of Deep Freeze
30.description: Increases the range of Deep Freeze by 10 yards.

31.name: Glyph of Living Bomb
31.description: The periodic damage from your Living Bomb can now be critical strikes.

32.name: Glyph of Arcane Barrage
32.description: Reduces the mana cost of Arcane Barrage by 20%.

33.name: Glyph of Mirror Image
33.description: Your Mirror Image spell now creates a 4th copy.

34.name: Glyph of Ice Barrier
34.description: Increases the amount of damage absorbed by your Ice Barrier by 30%.

35.name: Glyph of Eternal Water
35.description: Your Summon Water Elemental now lasts indefinitely, but your Water Elemental can no longer cast Freeze.

21.name: Glyph of Arcane Intellect
21.description: Reduces the mana cost of your Arcane Intellect and Arcane Brilliance spells by 50%.

22.name: Glyph of Fire Ward
22.description: You have an additional 5% chance to reflect Fire spells while your Fire Ward is active.

23.name: Glyph of Frost Armor
23.description: Increases the duration of your Frost Armor and Ice Armor spells by 30 min.

24.name: Glyph of Frost Ward
24.description: You have an additional 5% chance to reflect Frost spells while your Frost Ward is active.

25.name: Glyph of the Penguin
25.description: Your Polymorph: Sheep spell polymorphs the target into a penguin instead.

26.name: Glyph of Slow Fall
26.description: Your Slow Fall spell no longer requires a reagent.

28.name: Glyph of Blast Wave
28.description: The mana cost of your Blast Wave spell is reduced by 15%, but it no longer knocks enemies back.

0.name: Glyph of Incinerate
0.description: Increases the damage done by Incinerate by 5%.

1.name: Glyph of Conflagrate
1.description: Your Conflagrate spell no longer consumes your Immolate or Shadowflame spell from the target.

2.name: Glyph of Corruption
2.description: Your Corruption spell has a 4% chance to cause you to enter a Shadow Trance state after damaging the opponent.  The Shadow Trance state reduces the casting time of your next Shadow Bolt spell by 100%.

3.name: Glyph of Curse of Agony
3.description: Increases the duration of your Curse of Agony by 4 sec.

4.name: Glyph of Death Coil
4.description: Increases the duration of your Death Coil by 0.5 sec.

5.name: Glyph of Fear
5.description: Increases the damage your Fear target can take before the Fear effect is removed by 20%.

6.name: Glyph of Felguard
6.description: Increases the Felguard's total attack power by 20%.

7.name: Glyph of Felhunter
7.description: When your Felhunter uses Devour Magic, you will also be healed for that amount.

8.name: Glyph of Health Funnel
8.description: Reduces the pushback suffered from damaging attacks while channeling your Health Funnel spell by 100%.

9.name: Glyph of Healthstone
9.description: You receive 30% more healing from using a healthstone.

10.name: Glyph of Howl of Terror
10.description: Reduces the cooldown on your Howl of Terror spell by 8 sec.

11.name: Glyph of Immolate
11.description: Increases the periodic damage of your Immolate by 10%.

12.name: Glyph of Imp
12.description: Increases the damage done by your Imp's Firebolt spell by 20%.

13.name: Glyph of Searing Pain
13.description: Increases the critical strike bonus of your Searing Pain by 20%.

14.name: Glyph of Shadow Bolt
14.description: Reduces the mana cost of your Shadow Bolt by 10%.

15.name: Glyph of Shadowburn
15.description: Increases the critical strike chance of Shadowburn by 20% when the target is below 35% health.

16.name: Glyph of Siphon Life
16.description: Increases the healing you receive from your Siphon Life talent by 25%.

17.name: Glyph of Soulstone
17.description: Increases the amount of health you gain from resurrecting via a Soulstone by 300%.

18.name: Glyph of Succubus
18.description: Your Succubus's Seduction ability also removes all damage over time effects from the target.

19.name: Glyph of Unstable Affliction
19.description: Decreases the casting time of your Unstable Affliction by 0.2 sec.

20.name: Glyph of Voidwalker
20.description: Increases your Voidwalker's total Stamina by 20%.

27.name: Glyph of Haunt
27.description: The bonus damage granted by your Haunt spell is increased by an additional 3%.

28.name: Glyph of Metamorphosis
28.description: Increases the duration of your Metamorphosis by 6 sec.

29.name: Glyph of Chaos Bolt
29.description: Reduces the cooldown on Chaos Bolt by 2 sec.

30.name: Glyph of Demonic Circle
30.description: Reduces the cooldown on Demonic Circle by 4 sec.

31.name: Glyph of Shadowflame
31.description: Your Shadowflame also applies a 70% movement speed slow on its victims.

32.name: Glyph of Life Tap
32.description: When you use Life Tap or Dark Pact, you gain 20% of your Spirit as spell power for 40 sec.

33.name: Glyph of Soul Link
33.description: Increases the percentage of damage shared via your Soul Link by an additional 5%.

34.name: Glyph of Quick Decay
34.description: Your haste now reduces the time between periodic damage ticks of your Corruption spell.

21.name: Glyph of Unending Breath
21.description: Increases the swim speed of targets affected by your Unending Breath spell by 20%.

22.name: Glyph of Drain Soul
22.description: Your Drain Soul ability occasionally creates an additional soul shard.

23.name: Glyph of Kilrogg
23.description: Increases the movement speed of your Eye of Kilrogg by 50% and allows it to fly in areas where flying mounts are enabled.

24.name: Glyph of Curse of Exhaustion
24.description: Increases the range of your Curse of Exhaustion spell by 5 yards.

25.name: Glyph of Enslave Demon
25.description: Reduces the cast time of your Enslave Demon spell by 50%.

26.name: Glyph of Souls
26.description: Reduces the mana cost of your Ritual of Souls spell by 70%.

0.name: Glyph of Frenzied Regeneration
0.description: While Frenzied Regeneration is active, healing effects on you are 20% more powerful.

1.name: Glyph of Maul
1.description: Your Maul ability now hits 1 additional target.

2.name: Glyph of Growl
2.description: Increases the chance for your Growl ability to work successfully by 8%.

3.name: Glyph of Mangle
3.description: Increases the duration of Mangle by 6 sec.

4.name: Glyph of Shred
4.description: Each time you Shred, the duration of your Rip on the target is extended 2 sec, up to a maximum of 6 sec.

5.name: Glyph of Rip
5.description: Increases the duration of your Rip ability by 4 sec.

6.name: Glyph of Rake
6.description: Your Rake ability prevents targets from fleeing.

7.name: Glyph of Swiftmend
7.description: Your Swiftmend ability no longer consumes a Rejuvenation or Regrowth effect from the target.

8.name: Glyph of Innervate
8.description: Innervate now grants the caster 45% of <his/her> base mana pool over 10 sec in addition to the normal effects of Innervate.

9.name: Glyph of Rebirth
9.description: Players resurrected by Rebirth are returned to life with 100% health.

10.name: Glyph of Regrowth
10.description: Increases the healing of your Regrowth spell by 20% if your Regrowth effect is still active on the target.

11.name: Glyph of Rejuvenation
11.description: While your Rejuvenation targets are below 50% health, you will heal them for an additional 50% health.

12.name: Glyph of Healing Touch
12.description: Decreases the cast time of Healing Touch by 1.5 sec, the mana cost by 25%, and the amount healed by 50%.

13.name: Glyph of Lifebloom
13.description: Increases the duration of Lifebloom by 1 sec.

14.name: Glyph of Starfire
14.description: Your Starfire ability increases the duration of your Moonfire effect on the target by 3 sec, up to a maximum of 9 additional seconds.

15.name: Glyph of Insect Swarm
15.description: Increases the damage of your Insect Swarm ability by 30%, but it no longer affects your victim's chance to hit.

16.name: Glyph of Hurricane
16.description: Your Hurricane ability now also slows the movement speed of its victims by 20%.

17.name: Glyph of Starfall
17.description: Reduces the cooldown of Starfall by 30 sec.

18.name: Glyph of Wrath
18.description: Reduces the pushback suffered from damaging attacks while casting your Wrath spell by 50%.

19.name: Glyph of Moonfire
19.description: Increases the periodic damage of your Moonfire ability by 75%, but initial damage is decreased by 90%.

20.name: Glyph of Entangling Roots
20.description: Increases the damage your Entangling Roots victims can take before the Entangling Roots automatically breaks by 20%.

28.name: Glyph of Focus
28.description: Increases the damage done by Starfall by 20%, but decreases its radius by 50%.

29.name: Glyph of Berserk
29.description: Increases the duration of Berserk by 5 sec.

30.name: Glyph of Wild Growth
30.description: Wild Growth can affect 1 additional target.

31.name: Glyph of Nourish
31.description: Your Nourish heals an additional 6% for each of your heal over time effects present on the target.

32.name: Glyph of Savage Roar
32.description: Your Savage Roar ability grants an additional 3% bonus damage done.

33.name: Glyph of Monsoon
33.description: Reduces the cooldown of your Typhoon spell by 3 sec.

34.name: Glyph of Barkskin
34.description: Reduces the chance you'll be critically hit by melee attacks by 25% while Barkskin is active.

35.name: Glyph of Survival Instincts
35.description: Your Survival Instincts ability grants an additional 15% of your maximum health.

36.name: Glyph of Claw
36.description: Reduces the energy cost of your Claw ability by 5.

37.name: Glyph of Rapid Rejuvenation
37.description: Your haste now reduces the time between the periodic healing ticks of your Rejuvenation spell.

21.name: Glyph of Aquatic Form
21.description: Increases your swim speed by 50% while in Aquatic Form.

22.name: Glyph of Unburdened Rebirth
22.description: Your Rebirth spell no longer requires a reagent.

23.name: Glyph of Thorns
23.description: Increases the duration of your Thorns ability by 50 min when cast on yourself.

24.name: Glyph of Challenging Roar
24.description: Reduces the cooldown of your Challenging Roar ability by 30 sec.

25.name: Glyph of the Wild
25.description: Mana cost of your Mark of the Wild and Gift of the Wild spells reduced by 50%.

26.name: Glyph of Dash
26.description: Reduces the cooldown of your Dash ability by 20%.

27.name: Glyph of Typhoon
27.description: Reduces the cost of your Typhoon spell by 8% and increases its radius by 10 yards, but it no longer knocks enemies back.
